name: WebGLRenderingContext.copyTexSubImage2D
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.copyTexSubImage2D() method of the WebGL API copies pixels from the current WebGLFramebuffer into an existing 2D texture sub-image.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'copyTexSubImage2D' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glCopyTexSubImage2D' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
